name: Dankshard, Galaxy Brain
imagePrompt: A wise, slightly tired-looking analyst in a futuristic trading room, surrounded by holographic charts and social media feeds, wearing a t-shirt that says '$DANK Crypto Cabal'. He has a focused expression, maybe with a coffee cup nearby.
abilityText: Battlecry: Draw a card. Divine Shield. 'Yeah, it's still not obvious for me either, but we're up 3000% so who cares.'
flavorText: gm, chroniclers! The market is dead but not for those who stay green. This would be INSANE. (It was not insane.)
